H0.text: In which country was the 2006 FIFA World Cup held. Germany

H1.text: In which country was the 2006 FIFA World Cup held. Brazil

H2.text: In which country was the 2006 FIFA World Cup held. Italy

H3.text: In which country was the 2006 FIFA World Cup held. Nimska

A4.text: It was held from 9 June to 9 July 2006 in Germany, which had won the right to host the event in July 2000.

A5.text: Germany, the host nation, was granted automatic qualification, with the remaining 31 finals places divided among the continental confederations.
